metadata.name: ABRAHAM
metadata.description:
ABRAHAM 

Digital art of the original hand painting, painted at EmblematiX Studio in Los Angeles, 2019-2023  

Original painting 
Acrylic on Panel, 30"x40"

In this portrait, we see an old and wise man with a face etched with lines of experience and a gaze that seems to hold the secrets of the ages. He is dressed in simple robes, and his long white beard cascades down, giving him an air of authority and reverence. His eyes are deep and piercing, and as we look into them, we can almost hear the story he is telling. 
This painting captures the essence of a biblical storyteller, a man who has lived a life of faith and has much to share with those who seek to learn from him.
